description:
Typical average monthly electric bills for residential, commercial and industrial customers. 
-Residential customer bills are computed for usages of 0, 250, 500, 750, 3000, and 5000 KWH.  
-Commercial customer bills are computed demands, load factors and usages of:
	- 10 KW, 20%, and 1440 KWH
	- 10 KW, 30%, and 2160 KWH 
	- 50 KW, 25%, and 9000 KWH
	- 50 KW, 35%, and 12600 KWH
	- 250 KW, 30%, and 54000 KWH
	- 250 KW, 50%, and 9000 KWH
- Industrial customer bills are computed demands, load factors and usages of:
	- 500 KW, 40%, and 144000 KWH
	- 2000 KW, 50%, and 720000 KWH 
	- 10000 KW, 65%, and 4680000 KWH

metadata.attribution: New York State Public Service Commission

name: Typical Utility Bill Information Electric: Beginning 2011
